column5: Where is a good place to park for access to the Grand in Brantford downstream of the special regs section? Going to be wading and going for bass.  Don't need any hotspots (I will find those myself lol) just a good place to park.  Thanks!!!!!  Burt

there are walking trails along pretty much the entire river in brantford. if you google "brantford trail map" you'll see what i'm talking about and i believe it shows parking areas too. the downtown area is easily accessed and holds plenty of bass with the odd walleye.
